titleStmt.title: This court, having received frequent complaints of the many mischiefs arising to the free-men of this city in their trade and commerce, occasion'd by foreign-buying and foreign-selling ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Stamp, Thomas, Sir, 1628-1711.

notesStmt.note: Title from first four lines of text.
At head of title: Stamp mayor. Martis decimo die Novembr', 1691; annoque regni Regis & Reginæ, Willielmi & Mariæ, Angl', &c. tertio.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
